reviewText: Superb portrayal of a very great writer; the demands on his work, his health and his time are shown in all its power and intimacy. His loving relationship to Pilar, her strength and intelligence show how integrally these two individuals were united in the oeuvre that was and is Saramago! A great film.

If you are a Saramago fun, you hav to see it. This documentary put you inside his life, you get to know his thoughts, his relationship with Pilar and friends. His opinions about what is going on in his day to day, it is jus great, very intimate and it is fun, you enjoy him for sure.
